title: Epistemological Definition and Learning Design Framework for Open Educational Practices

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level math knowledge and experience using digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Exploring methods to apply mathematical thinking to open educational environments for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain core concepts of epistemological definitions in open educational environments (OEP).
Learners practice equitable knowledge sharing in collaborative problem-solving projects using digital tools.
Learners develop educational materials reflecting the sociocultural context of mathematical concepts by applying a learning design framework.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
